props.name: direction
props.description: The direction the view should slide

props.name: duration
props.description: The animation duration - will effect the speed of the slide

props.name: start
props.description: The animation starting x offset from screen edge (In 'left' direction will be subtracted from screen width)

props.name: end
props.description: The animation ending x offset from screen edge (In 'right' direction will be subtracted from screen width)
